lines.text: As useless as lemonade at a bootleggers' picnic.
Marjorie Dare - Heiress. Owner of the Midvale Salt Company, but - more sugar than salt herself.
White chief bring papoose long time ago. His shot in head - maybe crazy. Not know his name. Me fix him, call him Ben Tangleface. Keep him, two - three years. Me no tell nobody nothing before.
Electric glims, talk box and all conveniences, away out here in the wilderness! Say Stewart, when it comes to putting on the swell, you're it.
Wait! I love you Marjorie. I tried to win you honorably. I want to marry you now. It is night, we are alone. Think it over.
Where tragedy ends - a honeymoon begins.
